front.title: A Conservative Selective Acknowledgment (SACK)-based Loss Recovery Algorithm for TCP

abstract.t: This document presents a conservative loss recovery algorithm for TCPthat is based on the use of the selective acknowledgment (SACK) TCPoption. The algorithm presented in this document conforms to thespirit of the current congestion control specification (RFC 2581),but allows TCP senders to recover more effectively when multiplesegments are lost from a single flight of data.
